definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: TSMC share prices skyrocketed to reach the ceiling price of 60 NT in mid-session.
sentences.chinese: 盤中臺積電股價急拉大漲，一度衝高到60元漲停。

sentences.english: This is my first time trip to Chung Tai Chan Monastery.
sentences.chinese: 這是我第一次到中臺禪寺。
